Reviews.Title: Good entry level smartphone with duol sim
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I chose this LG phone for few good reasons.1. Low pricing - barely above 100 bucks.2. Functionality - it has almost everything other hi end smart phone has.3. Dual Sim - very few smartphones provide Dual Sim at this price point4. Form Factor - cigarette box size with fully rounded corners. I would have pick up Samsung if LG can't offer me any model with rounded corners.5. If You Don't Fussy - on its 3 mega camera and its screen resolution (compare to other hi end model like Samsung Note 2)

ProductInfo.Features: LG Optimus L3 E405F Dual SIM 3G Wi-Fi, Android 2.3 Factory Unlocked
ProductInfo.Name: LG Optimus L3 E405F Black Dual Sim, 3MP, 3G , WIFI Unlocked Mobile Phone
